associated_spectra: [{'name': 'La0.7Sr0.3MnO3/SrTiO3-(001) heterostructure, oxygen vacancies', 'link': 'https://eelsdb.eu/spectra/la0-7sr0-3mno3srtio3-001-heterostructure-oxygen-vacancies/', 'type': 'Core Loss'}, {'name': 'La0.7Sr0.3MnO3/SrTiO3-(001) heterostructure, brown millerite oxygen vacancies', 'link': 'https://eelsdb.eu/spectra/la0-7sr0-3mno3srtio3-001-heterostructure-brown-millerite-oxygen-vacancies/', 'type': 'Core Loss'}, {'name': 'La0.7Sr0.3MnO3/SrTiO3-(001) Heterostructure', 'link': 'https://eelsdb.eu/spectra/la0-7sr0-3mno3srtio3-001-heterostructure-2/', 'type': 'Core Loss'}]
description: 35 nm La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin film grown epitaxially on a SrTiO3 substrate using PLD, acquired from the middle of film.

reference.authors: M. Nord, P. E. Vullum, M. Moreau, J. E. Boschker, S. M. Selbach, R. Holmestad, T. Tybell
reference.title: Structural phases driven by oxygen vacancies at the La0.7Sr0.3MnO3/SrTiO3 hetero-interface

title: La0.7Sr0.3MnO3/SrTiO3-(001) heterostructure
